long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple productivity chrome extension designed for students who would like to minimise internet access while studying. 

How to use:

1. Simply enter the websites you would like to access during the work session. e.g. youtube.com, khanacademy.org.

2. Input the desired ending time for your work session.
